This new Act introduces a revised Chapter IX concerning "Penalties and Adjudicating Mechanism". Over 60% of the state is urbanized, accounting for 10.6% of the country's urban population, while only comprising 6% of India's total population. MSMEs produce a wide variety of products in almost all sectors. The Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises sectors play a vital role in their economic development. This sector contributes about 45% of the Industrial Production, 40% of exports and it forms part of about 95% of the total industrial units in the country. There is nearly 11.10 lakh registered MSMEs in Tamil Nadu as of 31.3.15, employing 69.69 lakh persons with a total investment of about Rs.91,480 crore.Compliance CalendarThere are so many HR compliances to be taken care of every month, throughout the year.
